title: Low calorie chocolate and morello cherry cake
ingredients: ['1 ramekin (about 110g) chocolate chips (70% cocoa)', '1 tablespoon kirsch, plus extra to taste', '375ml Greek yoghurt (either 2% or fat-free)', '1 teaspoon vanilla paste or extract', '2 eggs', 'stevia or truvia to sweeten, to taste', '200g wholewheat flour', '85g cocoa powder', '1 1/2 teaspoons bicarbonate of soda', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 ramekin (about 100g) morello cherries (in syrup)']
